Eisenhower Matrix

  • Urgent and Important

    (30mins):Identify tasks that are both urgent and important.Take a 5min Break

  • Important but Not Urgent

    (1 hour):These tasks are valuable for long-term goals and take 10mins break

  • Urgent but Not Important

    (30mins):These tasks might be delegated or simplified to save time.
